Title: SEIKO 5 Sports Automatic SRP750 Black Dial Luminous Markers Rubber Band Mens Wat
Description: Add to Favourite | Contact Us Brand Seiko Casio Citizen Men's Watches Accessories   Bands Other   Home Payment Domestic and International Shipping Returns Policy Warranty Contact Us       SHOP CATEGORIES Brand Seiko Casio Citizen Men's Watches Accessories Bands Other SEIKO 5 Sports Automatic SRP750 Black Dial Luminous Markers Rubber Band Mens Wat     PRODUCT DESCRIPTION From the start, Seiko 5 was designed to break the mold of watch performance and to bring to the young 1960’s generation a watch that belonged to their age and that fitted into their lives. As perhaps never before, young people of the day saw no limits to their aspirations. Seiko 5 needed to be a watch that could go anywhere and everywhere. The first challenge was durability. To be durable, a watch needs to be impervious to two threats; water and shock. Water resistance was built in as standard to every Seiko 5 watch, and metal bracelets were used so that, from buckle to buckle, the watch was resistant to water and sweat. Shock resistance was assured with two Seiko inventions. First, the mainspring was made from “Diaflex,” an unbreakable alloy, and the “Diashock,” system was created to protect the movement from shock within the case. Legibility was the next vital attribute. Today, we take for granted that day and date are presented in a single window but, in fact, this was an idea built in to Seiko 5 to enhance the legibility of the dial. The genius was to create a unique system that allowed both day and date to be shown in one plane. The final challenge was to create a distinctive look that defined the brand. Thanks to the extraordinary Seiko invention of the ‘Magic Lever,’ the winding efficiency of Seiko 5 is very high, and the wearer rarely needs to use the crown. So the designers made it smaller and hid it under the lip of the case at 4 o’clock, giving Seiko 5 its signature look.   Specification PAYMENT SHIPPING & PACKAGE RETURNS FEEDBACK Brand Seiko MPN SRP750K1 UPC 3866488426223 Movement Automatic Self-Winding Water Resistance Rating 100 m (10 ATM) Watch Shape Round Case Material Stainless Steel Case Colour Gold Face Colour Black Band Material Rubber Band Colour Black Case Size 44mm Gender Men Paypal or Bank Deposit (Please write your eBay ID in the reference) for Australia buyers. International buyers payment is via PayPal only. All major credit cards via Paypal. Payment must be received within seven (7) days after purchase Taxes All buyers responsible for import taxes (Contact us for more detail) Shipping Local Within Australia : Free EXPRESS Shipping comes with Tracking International : Flat Rate AU$34 International Shipping comes with Tracking Please make sure your shipping address is correct Packaging What's in the package? Genuine watch with tag, genuine box, manual and warranty card How do we package: We bubble wrap the actual watch within the box and On the top of that we also Bubble Wrap the box itself We fully understand that buying an expensive item over the internet can be a very anxious process. We therefore offer a 30 days money back Guarantee. That allows you to have the watch fully inspected locally. Our sole purpose is to make sure that you are happy. If for any reason, you are not completely satisfied with any purchase from the store you can return your purchase for either an exchange or a refund. Any item returned must contain all retail packaging and have any tags and labels still attached and the item must show no signs of use. A correctly supplied item where the buyer has changed their mind, the cost of the return is the responsibility of the buyer. If a defective or incorrectly supplied item is sent the cost of the return postage will be refunded back to the buyer. The watch needs to be returned to us within 30 days. All items must be returned with tracking and by a signed for delivery service as we can not be held responsible or refund items lost in the post. All refunds will be processed within 48 hours of the item being received and unless we have send either an incorrect or defective item a full refund will be provided with a deduction for the cost of the original postage We will not accept any returned items, particularly watches that have been sent in a 'Jiffy' type bubble envelope. This is not sufficient enough to protect the contents or the retail packaging from being crushed. Please either re- use the cardboard box we sent your item in or use something similar. It is the buyers responsibility to ensure we receive the item back in perfect condition. Worldwide Customers - On the customs declaration form please indicate you are returning unsuitable goods to the original vendor. Failure to do this may cause delays and more importantly if we have to pay customs taxes to receive our item back because the customs declaration form has been incorrectly completed then this sum will be deducted from any refund made. We value your custom and as such your positive feedback is very important to us. We aim for 5 stars in each category. In the rare event of a problem, before leaving feedback please email us so we have the opportunity to rectify any issues you may have. If you have any questions prior to making a purchase please contact us through eBay messages.
